text: Feng Mengya (, born 1947) is a female Chinese former international table tennis player. ==Table tennis career== She won a bronze medal at the 1965 World Table Tennis Championships in the women's doubles with Li Li. ==See also== * List of table tennis players * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:Chinese female table tennis players Category:Living people Category:1947 births Category:Sportspeople from Wuxi Category:Table tennis players from Jiangsu Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists
title: Feng Mengya
